column5: a woman was ------murdered------ at a light bulb factory called “T.Y. ELECTRIC CO.LTD” in Svay Rieng district
column7: a 24-year-old is believed to have been killed at her workplace by ------ Neang Kroem
column8: 25  ------who appeared to------ have committed suicide ------after the crime.------Earlier monks visited the factory and performed a traditional ceremony in front of the staff in order to appease the spirit of the victim. ------SOURCE
